capabilities.name: Experiment registry
capabilities.description: Dataclass-backed experiment records with JSON storage and audit hooks for create/status updates.

capabilities.name: Dataset registry
capabilities.description: File-backed dataset records capturing owner, dataset type, URI, tags, and metadata with audit emission.

capabilities.name: Job runner + registry
capabilities.description: Creates and executes jobs against registered module operations, persists results, and records audit events.

capabilities.name: Plugin loader
capabilities.description: Registers ModuleDescriptor objects and exposes operations for scientific plugins; auto-loads built-in stubs.

capabilities.name: Provenance metadata
capabilities.description: In-memory ModuleMetadata registry feeding Method & Data UI surfaces with citations and limitations.

capabilities.name: EI-MS fragmentation stub
capabilities.description: Deterministic placeholder returning module-tagged dataset/audit payloads for EI-MS demos.

capabilities.name: P-Chem calorimetry stub
capabilities.description: Deterministic metadata emitter for calorimetry walkthroughs; no thermodynamics performed.

capabilities.name: Import wizard stub
capabilities.description: Emits dataset/audit placeholders for data onboarding scenarios without touching real files.

capabilities.name: Control Panel modes
capabilities.description: Streamlit Control Panel with Learner/Lab/Builder banners, tips, and mode-aware copy.

capabilities.name: Module inspector
capabilities.description: UI section exposing registered module descriptors/operations for safe inspection across modes.
